job_tasks.phrase: Be a true consultant and efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly addresses understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions, which aligns with the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture
job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing architecture, especially cloud architecture, falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Building and deploying data pipelines, whether batch or streaming, is a core part of MLOps and infrastructure management.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
job_tasks.justification: Building and deploying production-ready applications on cloud platforms is a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with ML and Software Engineers, Project Managers, and clients
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with various roles, fitting the Communication & Collaboration category.

soft_skills.phrase: Be a true consultant and efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly describes the consultant role, translating business needs to technical solutions and communicating with stakeholders, which falls under Business Understanding & Strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with ML and Software Engineers, Project Managers, and clients
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates collaboration with various professional roles, aligning with the Communication & Collaboration category.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on building and deploying data pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and production-ready applications using a variety of cloud platforms and traditional data tools (Macro-Category A tasks). While it mentions AI and ML in the context of client projects and collaboration, the core responsibilities described are centered around software engineering and data engineering rather than specific AI model development, fine-tuning, or prompt engineering (Macro-Category B tasks). The role is about building the infrastructure and applications that *support* AI/ML, rather than developing the AI models themselves. Therefore, it fits the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software engineering and data engineering tasks, along with specific technologies. However, it lacks explicit details about the AI/ML models or generative AI techniques that would be used, making it lean towards an adjacent role rather than a core AI/ML role. The mention of 'AI Engineer' in the title is somewhat ambiguous given the described tasks.
